thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 10 of 110
thread.title: DWIGHT

author: DWIGHT
title: DWIGHT
text:
I did not realize there were two different certificates, one of insurance and one for the court to have tickets. Had this been pointed our up front I could have saved time. After receiving my certificate I delivered it to the court clerk who informed me it was not the correct certificate, it needed to specify the court. When I contracted I drive safely staff about this problem I was at first informed that I would have to pay the $25 fee again and retake the course. In escalating this matter I found retaking the course was not necessary and that if I paid $10 for the municipal court certificate and had a Student Affidavit notarized I could obtain the certificate I needed. While this was acceptable to me I still don't understand and agree with having the student affidavit, especially since I was able to take the course and obtain an insurance certificate without the affidavit. Thanks. I am overall satisfied.
Regards,
